sentences.sContent: You have diabetes, or liver or kidney disease.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have diabetes, or liver or kidney disease.
sentences.sCn: 有糖尿病，或者是有肝病或肾病者。

sentences.sContent: But, if you haveidentical twins and one has Type 1 diabetes, the chances of the other one hasdiabetes is only about 40%.
sentences.sContent_eng: But, if you haveidentical twins and one has Type 1 diabetes, the chances of the other one hasdiabetes is only about 40%.
sentences.sCn: 但是，如果你有同卵双胞胎，并且一个有1型糖尿病，另一个也有糖尿病的机会只是大约40％。

sentences.sContent: We can then translate this information into estimates of the current diabetes and cardiovascular disease that can be attributed to the rise in consumption of these drinks.
sentences.sContent_eng: We can then translate this information into estimates of the current diabetes and cardiovascular disease that can be attributed to the rise in consumption of these drinks.
sentences.sCn: 然后我们可以将这些信息转变成对当前糖尿病和冠心病的估计，而这些疾病是软饮料消耗量的增加所导致的。

phrases.pCn: 妊娠（期）糖尿病；孕期糖尿病
青少年糖尿病；幼年型糖尿病

trans.tranOther: a serious disease in which there is too much sugar in your blood
